rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 34 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:43 PM, 16 July 2025(Wednesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Quezon, Rizal, Metro Manila, Bulacan, Laguna, Batangas and Cavite within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(Palauig, Iba, Subic, Botolan, Cabangan, San Marcelino), Tarlac(San Jose, Mayantoc, Capas, Bamban) and Pampanga(Angeles, Porac, Mabalacat) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
